alert.note: Alert for Washita (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 6:58AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Washita, northwestern Grady, Caddo, northeastern Kiowa and southwestern Canadian Counties through 745 AM CDT... At 658 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hinton to near Cloud Chief. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Anadarko, Tuttle, Carnegie, Minco, Mountain View, Binger, Fort Cobb, Eakly, Gracemont, Lookeba, Colony, Cogar, Alfalfa, Cloud Chief, Boone, Fort Cobb Reservoir, Albert, Lake Chickasha, and Cowden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
